SEARCH
Package com.example.donotredeem

Class UserProfileManager

java.lang.Object
com.example.donotredeem.UserProfileManager
public class UserProfileManager extends Object
Manages user profile operations including Firestore interactions for follow requests, profile updates, and user data retrieval.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static interface 
    UserProfileManager.OnDeleteListener
    Interface for handling delete operations.
    static interface 
    UserProfileManager.OnUpdateListener
    Interface for handling update operations.
    static interface 
    UserProfileManager.OnUserProfileFetchListener
    Interface for handling the result of fetching a user profile.

  • Method Details

    • acceptFollowRequest

      public void acceptFollowRequest(String currentUser, String requesterUsername, UserProfileManager.OnUpdateListener listener)
      Accepts a follow request and updates both users' relationship data.
      Parameters:
      currentUser - The username of the user accepting the request
      requesterUsername - The username of the user who sent the request
      listener - Callback to handle operation success/failure

    • declineFollowRequest

      public void declineFollowRequest(String currentUser, String requesterUsername, UserProfileManager.OnUpdateListener listener)
      Declines a follow request from another user.
      Parameters:
      currentUser - The username of the user declining the request
      requesterUsername - The username of the requester
      listener - Callback to handle operation success/failure

    • addToRequestsList

      public void addToRequestsList(String targetUsername, String loggedInUsername, UserProfileManager.OnUpdateListener callback)
      Adds the logged-in user to the requests list of the target user's document.
      Parameters:
      targetUsername - The username of the target user (being followed).
      loggedInUsername - The username of the logged-in user (who is following).
      callback - Callback to handle success or error.

    • getUserProfile

      public void getUserProfile(String username, UserProfileManager.OnUserProfileFetchListener callback)
      Retrieves a user profile from Firestore.
      Parameters:
      username - Username of the user to fetch
      callback - Callback to handle success or failure

    • removeFromFollowingList

      public void removeFromFollowingList(String username, String targetUsername, UserProfileManager.OnUpdateListener listener)
      Removes a user from the following list of another user.
      Parameters:
      username - The username performing the action
      targetUsername - The username being unfollowed
      listener - Callback to handle success or failure

    • removeFromFollowersList

      public void removeFromFollowersList(String username, String targetUsername, UserProfileManager.OnUpdateListener listener)
      Removes a user from the followers list of another user.
      Parameters:
      username - The username performing the action
      targetUsername - The username being unfollowed
      listener - Callback to handle success or failure

    • updateUser

      public void updateUser(User updatedUser, String username)
      Updates an existing user profile in Firestore.
      Parameters:
      updatedUser - the Users object to add to Firestore.
      username - the unique ID for the user.

    • getUserProfileWithFollowers

      public void getUserProfileWithFollowers(String username, UserProfileManager.OnUserProfileFetchListener callback)
      Retrieves a user profile along with their followers, following list, requests, and mood references.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user whose profile is being fetched.
      callback - Callback to handle the result (success or failure).

    • deleteUser

      public void deleteUser(String username, UserProfileManager.OnDeleteListener listener)
